attributes.comment:
The new rate hike proposal is just simply ' highway robbery' These fees should be
set to help encourage families from adopting, not discourage. I am a 'waiting'
adoptive parent, have paid the fees once, and am now facing having to pay them
yet again, at the increased rate just to bring by baby home -- since the application
is only good for 18 months and the process is currently taking more like 24+. An
extension fee, I could understand and likely agree with, but having to pay for them
all over again, when I didn't even get reap any benefit from the first set of
paperwork is absurd.

Please reconsider this fee increase, especially for those of us who have to re-
submit the paperwork due to expiration of the original documents. I can't tell you
how frustrating this is on top of the rest of the process taking so long!

Regards,
Allison Davis
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adoptive Parent, Allison Davis
